description.value:
Your species is defined by the Garou class. You are a werewolfâ€”a shapeshifter bound to Gaia. Your specific heritage (Breed) is chosen via the Breed feat (Homid, Metis, or Lupus) and provides additional traits; the Garou class itself supplies your core identity, forms, Rage, and Gnosis.

Do not add a separate species from the core rules. Use this placeholder so the character sheet reflects that species and origin come from the Garou class and your Breed.
